data.name: Gamedec: Dafne Bennet - New Character
data.detailed_description: Meet Dafne Bennet! Ever since she was a child, Dafne was fascinated with strange worlds, which she traveled to by watching infolias and old holomovies. She wanted to satisfy her curiosity and hunger for adventure by joining the Out-Rangers, but her application was denied. Now, she travels to strange worlds by lying down on a couch and realizes her childhood dream as a gamedec.
data.about_the_game: Meet Dafne Bennet! Ever since she was a child, Dafne was fascinated with strange worlds, which she traveled to by watching infolias and old holomovies. She wanted to satisfy her curiosity and hunger for adventure by joining the Out-Rangers, but her application was denied. Now, she travels to strange worlds by lying down on a couch and realizes her childhood dream as a gamedec.
data.short_description: New playable skin of Dafne Bennet - Retro Steam Cyber Woman is taking over the cases in Virtual Worlds.
data.supported_languages: English, Polish, German, Simplified Chinese, Russian, French, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese
